reasoning_log: The matching process involved grouping images by room type (Living Room, Kitchen, Balcony, Corridor, Bedroom, Bathroom) and then using specific tags to differentiate between similar candidates (e.g., multiple views of the same room). For the Living Room (Images 1, 2, 3), Desc_3 was uniquely matched to Image_3 due to the visible track lighting and media console ('多組照明', '視聽牆預留'). For the Bedrooms (Images 8, 9, 12, 13), Desc_12 was matched to Image_12 due to the visible blue accent wall and exterior connection, while Desc_13 was matched to Image_13 based on the visible ceiling beam structure ('頂樓樑位明顯'). The two sets of bathrooms (Images 10/11 and 14/15) were distinguished by their floor tile patterns. Desc_11 emphasized '空間寬敞' and '視覺明亮', which Image_11 captured best with its wide view and colorful floor. Desc_15 emphasized '空間深度適中' and '採光仍偏弱', fitting the perspective of Image_15. All 15 descriptions were successfully mapped 1:1 to the 15 provided images.

matching_result_list.evidence: Shows the main living area with basic furniture ('基本家具') and a square layout ('規劃方正').
Wide view showing the connection to the hallway, emphasizing smooth flow ('動線順暢') and good sense of space ('空間感佳').
Clearly displays track lighting ('多組照明') and the media console area, confirming '視聽牆預留'.
The only kitchen image, showing the I-shaped counter ('一字型流理臺'), stove, and range hood.
Shows the narrow, long path ('動線狹長') of the utility balcony leading to a door, fitting the description of a reserved washer space.
View emphasizing the wall space suitable for storage/drying ('適合作儲物區') and the proximity to the neighboring structure.
The only interior corridor image, featuring smooth walls ('牆面平整') and reliance on artificial light ('採光依賴燈光').
Empty room with a square layout ('格局方正') and a single window, fitting the general description of Bedroom 1.
Empty room with a noticeably rectangular/narrower shape ('房型狹長') compared to Image_8, with single-sided lighting.
View of Bathroom 1 (colorful floor) showing the basic setup where dry/wet areas are not fully separated ('乾溼未完全分離').
Wider view of Bathroom 1, emphasizing the spaciousness ('浴室空間寬敞') and bright visual aesthetic ('視覺明亮') created by the white walls and colorful floor.
Spacious room with a large window and a door connecting to an exterior area ('連接陽台/外廊'). Features a distinct light blue accent wall.
Spacious room with a large window bank ('大面窗景') and a clearly visible structural drop/beam near the ceiling ('頂樓樑位明顯').
View of Bathroom 2 (monochrome floor) showing the wall-mounted vanity ('掛牆式櫃體') and new fixtures.
View emphasizing the depth of the room ('空間深度適中') and the overall slightly lower light level compared to Bathroom 1 ('採光仍偏弱').
